scripts.build:samples: gulp install:samples && npm run build && gulp build:samples && gulp test:samples && gulp test:e2e:samples
scripts.publish: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && lerna publish --force-publish --exact -m "chore(@donews): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:beta: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && lerna publish --force-publish --dist-tag=beta -m "chore(@donews): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:next: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && lerna publish --force-publish --dist-tag=next --skip-git -m "chore(@donews): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:rc: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && lerna publish --force-publish --dist-tag=rc -m "chore(@donews): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:test: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && lerna publish --force-publish --dist-tag=test --skip-git -m "chore(@donews): publish %s release"
